mapper.select: SELECT sys_menu.menu_id, sys_menu.name, sys_menu.en_name, sys_menu.permission, sys_menu.path, sys_menu.parent_id, sys_menu.icon, sys_menu.sort_order, sys_menu.keep_alive, sys_menu.menu_type, sys_menu.create_time, sys_menu.update_time, sys_menu.del_flag, sys_menu.embedded, sys_menu.visible, sys_menu.component FROM sys_menu LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu ON sys_menu.menu_id = sys_role_menu.menu_id WHERE sys_menu.del_flag = '0' AND sys_role_menu.role_id = #{roleId} ORDER BY sys_menu.sort_order DESC
SELECT m.permission FROM sys_menu m, sys_role_menu rm WHERE m.menu_id = rm.menu_id AND m.del_flag = '0' AND rm.role_id IN (#{roleIds})
